title: Birdsongs of the Mesozoic Discography
description:
The discography of progressive Avant-Prog group Birdsongs of the Mesozoic. It included Mission of Burma's guitarist Roger Miller (on treated piano and organ) and tape manipulator Martin Swope (on guitar). With their unique fusion of electronic, avant-garde, classical music and jazz, Birdsongs were the forerunners of Boston's progressive-rock scene. After the release of their third album, Pyroclastics, Miller and Swope departed and the band became the project of virtuoso keyboardist Erik Lindgren.

contains:
1988 - Sonic Geology
1989 - Faultline
1992 - Pyroclastics
1993 - The Fossil Record 1980-1987
1995 - Dancing on A'A
2000 - Petrophonics
2003 - The Iridium Controversy
2006 - With David Greenberger: 1001 Real Apes
2006 - With Oral Moses: Extreme Spirituals
2008 - Dawn of the Cycads
